title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 487.4 - Consumer product tampering data base (cptdb)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 487.4 - Consumer product tampering data base (cptdb)

State Regulations
(a) Notification of all consumer product
tampering cases made to appropriate agencies in New York State shall be
reported to the CPTDB within five hours of their receipt of such
information. (b) Official
notification as described in subdivision (a) of this section shall be made via
the consumer product tampering telephone line, or by NYSPIN. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
487.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
